Description: expo-speech-recognition dependency missing; initialize() is a stub that does nothing. Voice icon appears in ChatScreen UI but feature is non-functional.
Dates are hardcoded to April 2025 week [27 28 29 30 1 2 3]. No dynamic date generation. Widget is static and non-functional.

Issue Title: Hardcoded demo task data in HomeScreen
Description: YESTERDAY_TASKS array contains fake demo data (Memory Lane / Morning Puzzle) mixed with real data. Should be removed or fetched from backend.
createPlaceholderMember creates temporary family member records for invitations but no mechanism to clean up stale placeholder entries.
AI summary generation exists in statisticsService but error path (line 378) just logs to console with no user feedback.

Issue Title: Placeholder Supabase credentials in production fallback
Description: Falls back to 'https://placeholder.supabase.co' and 'placeholder-key' if env vars missing. App will silently fail on all DB operations instead of showing clear error.

Issue Title: API key partially logged to console
Description: console.log prints first 8 chars of Gemini API key: apiKey.substring(0 8). Security risk in production builds.

Issue Title: Missing error handling for OAuth WebBrowser session
Description: WebBrowser.openAuthSessionAsync has no try/catch wrapper. If promise rejects the entire signInWithGoogle function crashes.
If supabase.auth.onAuthStateChange throws subscription remains undefined but listener may still be active causing memory leak.
No mutex or debounce prevents multiple simultaneous sends. User can spam send button causing duplicate messages and corrupted AI conversation state.

Issue Title: VoiceService callback resets on every render
Description: setInputText as useEffect dependency causes VoiceService.setCallback to be re-registered every render cycle. Stale closure risk.
handleAddFoundUser performs async operations then calls setIsSubmitting(false) in finally block. If user navigates away mid-operation React warns about unmounted state update.

Issue Title: Array index out of bounds not handled
Description: selectedPatient = patients[selectedPatientIndex] used without bounds check. If patients array is empty or index exceeds length app crashes.
catch block accesses err.message without type guard. If error is not an Error instance (e.g. string or null) this silently fails.
error.message accessed without instanceof Error check in catch block. Could throw secondary error.

Issue Title: No documented unsubscribe pattern for message subscription
Description: subscribeToMessages returns a Supabase channel subscription but callers may not properly unsubscribe leading to leaked real-time connections.

Issue Title: Inline arrow functions in list item handlers
Description: onPress={() => handleDeleteMember(member)} and similar callbacks create new function instances every render causing unnecessary child re-renders.

Issue Title: List rendered with .map() instead of FlatList
Description: timelineTasks rendered with Array.map() inside ScrollView. Should use FlatList for virtualization if list grows large.
renderTab accepts Icon: any losing all type checking and prop validation for tab icons.
Multiple Supabase query results and data objects cast to any. Defeats TypeScript type checking across entire task service layer.
insertData and query results repeatedly cast to any. Should use proper types from database.types.ts.
quiz_data and dbUpdates object cast to any. Need proper QuizData interface and typed update objects.
patient_ai_settings queries cast to any. Should leverage generated database types.

Issue Title: Unsafe nested property access via any cast
Description: (row.profiles as any)?.name bypasses type safety. profiles join type should be defined.
Debug logs expose OAuth URLs and redirect information. Should be removed or wrapped in __DEV__ check.
Logs API key status and request/response lifecycle. Remove or use proper logging framework.

Issue Title: 10 console statements in iOS speech service
Description: Every speech lifecycle event logged. Replace with conditional debug logging.

Issue Title: 10 console statements in Android speech service
Description: Every speech lifecycle event logged. Replace with conditional debug logging.

Issue Title: 5 console statements in iOS secure storage
Description: Logs key names being stored/retrieved. Could expose sensitive data in production logs.

Issue Title: 5 console statements in Android secure storage
Description: Logs key names being stored/retrieved. Could expose sensitive data in production logs.

Issue Title: 15 console statements in iOS notification service
Description: Extensive debug logging throughout notification lifecycle. Wrap in __DEV__ or remove.

Description: Debug logging for notification initialization and permissions.

Description: Errors in loading/toggling/deleting tasks logged but no user feedback.
Errors in loading posts / liking / views logged but no user feedback.
Errors logged but no user-facing feedback provided.

Issue Title: 6 console.error calls in user search service
Description: All error paths only log to console with no propagation to UI.
Error logged but no user-facing feedback provided.

Issue Title: 2 console.error calls in root App component
Description: Auth check and subscription errors logged but may leave app in broken state.
Warns about missing Supabase config but then uses placeholder values silently.
Stop and cancel errors logged silently.
Only checks length >= 6. No complexity requirements (uppercase / number / special char). No email format validation before API call.
Only checks if title is non-empty. No max length check or special character sanitization.

Issue Title: Weak identifier validation for user search
Description: Only checks length >= 3. No format validation for UID pattern or phone number format.
TouchableOpacity for show/hide password has no accessibilityLabel or accessibilityHint for screen readers.

Issue Title: Small touch targets without accessibility sizing
Description: switchButton TouchableOpacity may be < 44x44pt minimum on small screens violating WCAG guidelines.

Issue Title: No accessibility labels on interactive elements
Description: Multiple TouchableOpacity and Pressable components across screens lack accessibilityLabel props for VoiceOver/TalkBack.
Gemini API key first 8 characters printed via console.log in production. Must remove immediately.
console.log prints the key name when storing sensitive data. Could expose what secrets are being stored.
console.log prints the key name when storing sensitive data. Could expose what secrets are being stored.
Redirect URLs and OAuth session URLs logged in production. Could expose auth tokens.
